name: Bearly Fishing - Lame Jam Game 2022
description:
STORY: Two bears (Polly the polar bear & Brownie the black bear) are stuck on an ice block with a hole in the middle. They are both hungry and looking for fish to eat but the ice block is not big enough for the two of them! And it´s melting! It´s time for a BEARtle ROARyale to stay alive as the last bear!

TWO PLAYER GAME: Quickly throw special fish (RED FISH MELTS ICE  & BLUE FISH FREEZES ICE/ADDS SNOW PILES) at each other to try and get the other one to fall into the ice cold water (But throw carefully, you can end up freezeing the main fishing hole!). First bear in the water is a frozen loser and the remaining one get to eat all the fish! (Or just build a large ice platform together in peace, BEAR are no rules!)

HOW TO PLAY: Bear 1 moves with WASD and bear 2 moves with arrow keys. Both bears catch & throw fish with their "down" key  (hold to aim, the fish shows the angle, release to throw). Is the game BEARly working? Reset it with the R key

CREDITS:

Coding by: Hugo Baptista (HugoLCSB) & Isabell & Danny

2D art made by Robin Börjesson (robmancartoons.com, twitch.tv/robman92)

Sound & music by Isabell
